column4: anybody know how to re add the task bar to a menu once removed?
< running gutsy.... no problems with make what so ever
right click panel > Add to Panel > Menu Bar in that list
the menus are there the taskbar how ever isn't... you know... where the "tray icons" go
not necesary just something that would be pretty nice to have haha
It should be there under "System Tray"
aight will check again... thanks
make that Notification Area ... sorry
ahhh ok
would you by any chacne happen to know the applet for the networking that initially appears beside the "userr name?
oh snap got both back haha
that is nm-applet 'Network Monitor' I think is the same thing.
solve both my probs with the notification area haha
Wait, it's not... heh... try 'nm-applet &' in a terminal
hah... that works... now to figure out why my nm-applet died  :P
i have NM applet on one of my bars already and the "signal" chart is not working haha
sorry bout the death of your NM
It's ok, the command I told you to get it back does in fact work  :)
No harm no foul  :)
lol true...
well now back to getting my appearance right lol all the issues so far are out of the way.... now time to make it look pretty haha
